Package net.royalur

Class StandardGame<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll>

java.lang.Object
net.royalur.StandardGame<P,S,R>
Type Parameters:
P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board.
S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
R - The type of rolls that may be made.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game<P,S,R>
public class StandardGame<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll> extends Object implements Game<P,S,R>
A game of the Royal Game of Ur. Provides methods to allow the playing of games, and methods to support the retrieval of history about the moves that were made in games that have been played.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StandardGame(RuleSet<P,S,R> rules)
    Instantiates a game of the Royal Game of Ur that has not yet had any moves played.
    StandardGame(RuleSet<P,S,R> rules, List<GameState<P,S,R>> states)
    Instantiates a game of the Royal Game of Ur.
